snippet.title: Lackluster Manganese Prices Could Signal Trend
snippet.description:
Lackluster Manganese Prices Could Signal Trend
By Resource Investing News 02:00 PM EDT 06/25/13
Manganese is having a tough time keeping the market's attention recently, with prices on a steady decline in recent weeks. Weathering the storm is junior exploration company American Manganese, which recently received a patent for its manganese extraction process.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11963788/1/lackluster-manganese-prices-could-signal-trend.html
